examples: We need to take action to solve this problem.
The movie is full of action scenes.
Precisamos tomar uma ação para resolver esse problema.
O filme está cheio de cenas de ação.

suggested: Taking action towards your goals can bring a sense of fulfillment and happiness.
Feeling stuck and unable to take action can lead to a sense of sadness and hopelessness.
Frustration can build up when there is a lack of action or progress towards a desired outcome.
Sometimes the smallest actions can have the biggest impact.
The smell of action - the scent of sweat and hard work.
The feeling of action - the rush of adrenaline and the satisfaction of a job well done.
Taking action towards a common goal can foster a sense of connection and teamwork.
